Braids Manager v1.0

Application Guide

PART I: GENERAL INFORMATION

1. This application allows you to manage the test cables database
2. ADD, EDIT, and DELETE test cables by filling forms

PART II: HOW TO USE

1. Download the application
2. Set all the settings according to PART V
3. Run Braids-Manager.exe file

PART III: MAIN MENU

1. ADD
 1.1. This will allow you to add a new test cables to the database by filling a form
 1.2. At the end of the form press Y to submit the form and the new test cables will be added to the database
2. EDIT
 2.1. This will allow you to edit an existing test cable by filling a form
 2.2. At the end of the form press Y to submit the form and the test cable information will be edited
3. DELETE
 3.1. This will allow you to delete an existing barid only if it is the last one

PART IV: SCRIPT

-N/A-

PART V: SETTINGS

1. Database location --> The location of the user database. For example: database.db

PART VI: RELATED FILES

1. settings.txt
2. help.html
3. favicon.ico
